{"step_by_step_thinking": "The mechanism of adhesion of GIC restoration with tooth surface is described in Document [1]. According to this document, GIC chemically (ionic) bonds to the tooth structure (enamel and dentin) through a chelation reaction between the carboxyl groups of the polyacrylic acid and the calcium in the hydroxyapatite crystals of the tooth.
